website_summaries.verdict: A quality golf umbrella that will fit into anyone's budget and is  great for use in windy conditions.
pros: Auto-open button built into the handle
Double 60" canopy helps the umbrella stand up better against high wind
Windbuster technology enables wind to pass through the umbrella without breaking it
cons: Some have said that the opening and closing mechanism jams

customer_reviews.title: Less crappy than most umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Quality construction - No thin metal which will rust after 2 rain storms - No string which will become untied from the spokes after opening 3 or 4 times - Very large - Very lightweight - Easy to close & wrap - Good looking Cons: - Cheap plastic and nylon - So light, the wind might steal it one day
customer_reviews.author: CarGuy

customer_reviews.title: I've owned 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second one of these umbrellas. I accidently left the first one at a restaurant and reordered the exact same one again because it's a great umbrella. For the price, it can't be beat. I've been using this umbrella for years on the disc golf course and in rainy Oregon. It's lightweight, big, and has a good case it fits into. Five out of five, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella big for dog walks!
customer_reviews.text: Now that we've used this umbrella for a while, I'm glad to report that this is a great umbrella. The large size is perfect for dog walks as it covers me and my two little Shetland sheepdogs. It didn't take them long to figure that out! The fabric is a nice substantial weight, the pole and slider are solid and it operates smoothly. I like the vented top as it makes it easier to control this big umbrella in windy conditions. The bright red color makes us highly visible when we're by the road as well. What more can one expect from an umbrella?
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Stood up to a REAL storm
customer_reviews.text: We go through lots of umbrellas. That's because most of them, at all price points, fall apart quickly. This one has held up to lots of downpours, but most recently a real storm with screaming wind and sleet blowing parallel to the ground. This umbrella did not break, blow inside out, or otherwise fail. Not even one broken rib. It is also a decent size. More than enough for one person and just big enough for two people standing still (like during the above-mentioned storm when my spouse and I were watching one of our kids play a soccer game). And the storm was so strong the called off the soccer game at half time!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: a REAL umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is AWSOME! Unfortunately I left mine somewhere and will need to buy another one. Anyways, this thing is big. Big enough for two friends to walk side by side comfortably, big enough for four people to huddle under at the bus stop. The main shaft and ribs seem to be made of some composite of fiberglass. The top is vented and will withstand minor to moderate updrafts without even starting to flip. However, any umbrella will flip in the strongest of winds, but this one won't be damaged by that, like the cheap ones with cheap metal frames will be.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dewolf

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I bought this umbrella two months ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I bought this umbrella two months ago and it has help up nicely since then. I wish the handle and button were made of better material but it has not malfunctioned. It is a great umbrella for climates in which there are steady rainfalls, also very good for moderate level wind, have not tested it yet in heavy winds. For the price and size of the umbrella I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jtr1907

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Really well made umbrella. The handle has a great feel to it and the fabric is really good. This umbrella feels like its the right size in rainy weather, with smaller umbrellas I will always get some water on me somehow...not this one. Well made and great for the cost. Only bad thing was the way it was shipped. Someone stuck some plastic wrap around the handle a little too tightly and some plastic ended up being stuck in a very small gap above the handle. If you live where there is a lot of rain, I recommend this for you
customer_reviews.author: Dope Freshness

customer_reviews.title: The build-quality seems good for the $19
customer_reviews.text: 12/6/14: The umbrella looks exactly as advertised and is MASSIVE in size, just as I wanted! The build-quality seems good for the $19.99 I paid. I liked the feel of the rubber handle and the weight was lighter than I expected. The umbrella opened smoothly at the press of the button and it also came with a matching umbrella cover, which I had no problem using. I haven't had a chance to practically use it in the outdoor elements but from looking at its build-quality, I don't suspect any reason for it to fail. I plan to update this review after using it outdoors and will keep this review and rating until then.
customer_reviews.author: AIQBAL

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality...have only used it about four times and the fabric over one of the ribs is splitting open and the anchor point to the end of the rib broke off (didn't just slip off where you could re-attach it, but broke in half). I know it's not the most expensive umbrella out there, but I did not expect for it to be disposable after minimal, non-severe weather use and I certainly don't want to put someone's eye out with it as I walk down the sidewalk. It seemed nice at the time, but will look for something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H

customer_reviews.title: a good suprise.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good umbrella. Felt very sturdy and held up well in hurricane bob. :) j/k on the hurricane part. The best way I would describe this umbrella is it feels totally different than the ones you would buy from Walmart or even target. I was superseded on how "strong" the umbrella felt. My only gripe is it doesn't have a wrist strap or some machism to allow me to hang the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbydigital

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Had it since October 2015 and other than a small tear it's still going strong. Has withstood heavy rain, snow, and winds.
customer_reviews.author: MS101

customer_reviews.title: Large, quality umbrella that works well even in heavy storms
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality umbrella that is huge and does its job well. A bit difficult to lock back in place, but other than that I haven't had any issues with this umbrella. Do yourself a favor and get a full-sized golf umbrella; it may be less convenient than your typical "pocket umbrella," but the quality is orders of magnitude better and will actually keep you and your belongings dry in even the heaviest rain.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Naylor

customer_reviews.title: I've had this umbrella for over a year now. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this umbrella for over a year now. I've used it in all kinds of crazy rain, snow, and wind and never had an issue. It has never once shown a hint of trying to turn inside out in very high winds. It provides plenty of coverage for one or two people under it.
customer_reviews.author: xxmissvxx

customer_reviews.title: a Cafe Table Umbrella with a Handle!
customer_reviews.text: I live in southern California and I find myself praying for rain just so I can use this ridiculously large, yet awesome umbrella. Of course seeing that our climate is less and less predictable, who knows if this will ever get used. Build quality seems spot on and I have little doubt that this thing will keep me dry in the heaviest of downpours, if that ever happens.
customer_reviews.author: A. Krumm

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, bit heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one to keep at home and one in the office. Have used the past week and been very pleased with the quality. Its a bit heavy, guess thats to be expected for the size. Given the likelihood I end up leaving an umbrella somewhere at some point, I'm happy with these. Its high enough quality that it gets the job done, but I'm not gonna cry over losing it.
customer_reviews.author: Germanicus B Bus

customer_reviews.title: Solid but the grip handle fell off
customer_reviews.text: Okay so when the umbrella was here, I WAS IN LOVE WITH IT. It was wonderfully big and stylish. I love the comfortable grip but then after maybe 5th or 6th use on rainy days, the rubber grip came off and I lost it in the rain. I was left with an umbrella missing the grip. and I could see yellow super strong glue on it where the rubber grip left. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Gordon B.

customer_reviews.title: Big, but won't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas. It is just what I wanted for walking the kids to school on rainy or snowy days. I used it twice, just walking from my car a block away to the school and back, no wind, and the closing mechanism is already not working. So while the umbrella is good, the inability to keep it closed without using the velcro strap is very inconvenient especially on an umbrella so large!
customer_reviews.author: Mama2Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for a sturdy umbrella. I take it to lots of sporting events, and in rain and wind, it works well. I lived in London and gave up on umbrellas after too many turned inside out in the wind. It's nice to have one that seems it can withstand a little poor weather!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J K Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... I needed a larger umbrella and this one doesn't disappoint. It's extremely sturdy and the quality feels high
customer_reviews.text: I'm a larger person so I feel I needed a larger umbrella and this one doesn't disappoint. It's extremely sturdy and the quality feels high. I haven't had it in high winds yet but I've been in some moderate winds (maybe 20mph) and it handled it quite nicely. I also love that it's very visible in nasty weather.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gabel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, large umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 or 4 f these and donated them to my son's special needs class rooms over time, as well as keeping one at home. It is an excellent, large umbrella with easy automatic opening.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B22

customer_reviews.title: My second one!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one!!! And it is like the other one !
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Cat

customer_reviews.title: Large covered area.
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great umbrella. Very large though. Not for tight places to carry around discreetly. Must have for a sunny day or rainy day if you want real coverage. Stands about 3 ft tall closed. Not collapsible. If you need it, you need it, that's why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: GI consumer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made Golf Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this Umbrella on her Micro Cart during competition. Her cart has an umbrella holder and this stays on even when she played in a course in the hills where the winds are very gusty. The umbrella did not break, unlike the Bag Boy umbrella that she had before this one. We have used it in 3 Tournaments and it has worked very well. I really like this Golf Umbrella. It is the most durable umbrella we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. WhoTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Actually used it for a storm once and while it held up fine, this thing can't handle a beating
customer_reviews.text: Nope. Actually used it for a storm once and while it held up fine, this thing can't handle a beating. I laid it upside down leaning against a counter for a minute, it fell over and shattered, breaking all the internal structures and making it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Veganesque

customer_reviews.title: I had one for 2 years which worked perfectly. ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one for 2 years which worked perfectly. A really windy day ruined it sadly. Since then, I bought one more and had that one replaced. The new ones simply don’t lock close. I’m not sure if they are using a new supplier but I now can’t close this umbrella... given it’s size, it’s kind of important.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Thin fiberglass pole
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. First time I used it it's snapped in half. With a slight breeze. Past 30 day return
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: I love how large and lightweight it is
customer_reviews.text: I love how large and lightweight it is. I hate how the fabric slips off the ribs, making it look like it's broken, and not providing any cover.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Good Golf umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Good golf umbrella. My old one finally bit the dust so it was time to get a new one. Found this baby for reasonable price, I like the wind flaps (seem like a good idea, time will tell if they actually help) I just saw decent looking large umbrellas at Lowes for five bucks though, would have gone that route if I saw them first.
customer_reviews.author: GreenEng

customer_reviews.title: do you need a gigantic umbrella? this fits the ...
customer_reviews.text: do you need a gigantic umbrella? this fits the bill. not sure what else to say but it keeps you dry and has not broken... yet. i did think it was interesting that it is large enough the have two velcro wraps to secure it
customer_reviews.author: Jen L

customer_reviews.title: Large and well made
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is well made and has lots of room underneath. We found two or three people could fit under it with no problem. The cutout in the top makes it less prone to turning inside out in the wind. Actually mine is so nice it got stolen a week after I started using it. Moral of the story: Get this umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and covers well.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely wind proof and covers me and my power wheelchair reasonably well. I love the bright blue color. A great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in case of wedding day rain. Luckily we did not need, but my husband and I have used it since. It fits two people comfortably. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Golf Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a BIG golf umbrella - and I found this and thought it was a good size. When I received it I thought - WOW - how big it was - but my daughter wanted to keep it. It is a big umbrella in size and has a long handle - but light weight and very nice looking, I think it was a good buy for the item.
customer_reviews.author: The Cute One

customer_reviews.title: Compact design
customer_reviews.text: Compact. Have not used it yet. But seems study. I will recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: father_of_two

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Nice Size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. This one will "live" on my school bus. Too often I would drive back to the terminal in a pouring rain and be drenched running to my car - where the umbrella is! Well made, nice outer slip cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Redelfs

customer_reviews.title: Decent Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It is big, so it keeps you dry, even in driving rain. The double canopy is also a nice feature as gusts of wind are less prone to yank the umbrella out of your hand, or turn it inside out. The mechanism that clicks the canopy in the closed position seems a bit cheap. It doesn't click real easily - you have to be precise and firm, else it will unexpectedly pop back open on you.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum π

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it hasn't rained more than a few drops where I live since I bought this item four months ago, but I did get ambushed by a nasty thunderstorm up in New England during August. The umbrella fully lived up to its claims under high winds and pounding rain. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Umrath

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Durable and keeps me dry. It hasn't broken on me in about 20 uses so holding up to Oregon winds is a great thing. I love the pushbutton technology.
customer_reviews.author: J. Logsdon Martin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME...HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I go to every football game my grandson plays so if it's raining, I am sitting in it for a few hours. This umbrella is nice & big. It's great!! So far it's been sturdy althou there hasn't been any windy day's yet. It's big enough for twom people if you stand / walk very close together. I highly reccomend this one. Colors bright & crisp. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: Does not resist the updraft like I though it would
customer_reviews.text: Does not resist the updraft like I though it would. Slightest wind and it blows off my push cart. I need to find a way to secure it to the cart, but i am afraid it might topple everything over. Can't expect to much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Good value for oversized umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as well another golf umbrella for everyday use. This is generally a good product with important auto-open feature and storage sleeve. I was surprised to find that it didn't have the disc at the bottom to retain the umbrella struts when closed. However, that's a minor flaw
customer_reviews.author: P. Hargraves

customer_reviews.title: So durable.
customer_reviews.text: So durable. I've had this umbrella for 2 years with no issue. It's strong, it withstands winds. It's quite large. Which is a good thing. Unless you hate people with huge umbrellas, in which case this umbrella would make you a little hypocritical.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It should be able to close a little so you don't have to walk with it like a cane
customer_reviews.text: Ok umbrella......very large. It should be able to close a little so you don't have to walk with it like a cane. It also should have a strap so you can hold it on wrist. Another disappointment. Used it first time last week and this is too late to return
customer_reviews.author: mare

customer_reviews.title: I know it says 60 inches, but I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I know it says 60 inches, but I was still caught off guard by how big it is. I don't mind though since it's big enough for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 1345643386

customer_reviews.title: A fine umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is the best full size umbrella that I have owned. It is windproof and amazingly waterproof, as raindrops bead up and are easily shaken off when getting to my destination. The umbrella opens and closes very easily, and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kenasam

customer_reviews.title: This thing WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: In Virginia where I am we broke the June rainfall totals going back to 1955 and I think we're going to do it again for July. I was honestly shocked that this worked as well as it does. I wish I had this one for the last fourteen years but instead I have bought a new one about every two. I have already been caught in wind gusts of 35 MPH and that didn't phase this one. It is big enough for two people and is what it says it is, A REALLY GREAT UMBRELLA & EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE ONE!
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Great product considering the price. We have two of these now. It is a nice big size. Construction and materials seem decent. I have not had them long, but initial impressions are good. Again, cant beat the price. Even If we only get a year of use out of it, it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: we love this it's a good size too
customer_reviews.text: I got this umbrella. Last year and used. It today. Its still in very good condition even after my kids fight over it. Hard rains and winds. Its been used a lot and still use it in the hot sun to block the heat. Its in my van right now. Love it and it fits my whole family.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: the mechanism is what was bad and it broke when I used it the first ...
customer_reviews.text: A real piece of -----! the mechanism is what was bad and it broke when I used it the first time. I was going to send it back but I left it on our front porch and it blew away. really not loss at all except for what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: #1shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted: opens by itself, strong, light weight, flashy (so traffic will see me coming in bad weather). I didn't get the pattern pictured; I got black and white stripes. But it's all good. Now, if it will just last the next dozen years, like my last umbrella did, I'll be a very happy man.
customer_reviews.author: John Michael Albert

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the only umbrella that has lasted me so long without breaking. Really good quality for the price!!! It doesn't even flip open in the windy rain. It also has a little umbrella holder to keep your umbrella from dripping everywhere. Depending on how big you are you can share this umbrella comfortably with one or two others!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: It is light and big. I broke it in a month .
customer_reviews.author: Ecem Bozkurt

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good design
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella button stopped working shortly after I bought it now I can't close it pretty much useless
customer_reviews.author: S D

customer_reviews.title: This been nice for the few sprinkle/showers but I've only used it ...
customer_reviews.text: This been nice for the few sprinkle/showers but I've only used it once so far. It seems to be of nice quality and is sturdy in my umbrella mount on my push golf cart. NOTE: Remember to undue the 2 Velcro straps around the umbrella before trying to open it (lol).
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy construction with a wide coverage for shelter for two people under perpendicular rainfall (no wind) or adequately large enough for one person to angle under higher winds. I bought two of them; one for each of our vehicles. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mooveebuffer

customer_reviews.title: Blows inside out in even moderate wind
customer_reviews.text: Blows inside out in even a moderate wind (about every third time I use it). Go with a smaller umbrella. And it really is bigger than one person needs. But on the other hand, if you want a really big umbrella, and you don't have wind with your rain, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: much larger than expected and is very sturdy - can keep a small family dry :)
customer_reviews.author: pine y. tree

customer_reviews.title: Quality unbrella
customer_reviews.text: Awesome umbrella. Nice grip handle. Opens smoothly. Large. Using for Wanda in where's Waldo and it's perfect. Then it will be my go to umbrella this winter
customer_reviews.author: Always Star-wishing

customer_reviews.title: Seems Well Built
customer_reviews.text: This thing is big and feels sturdy. I'm happy with the opening action and the general build. I've only opened to take a look at it, but haven't used in the rain/wind yet. If I have any bad experiences I'll be back to update the rating accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time I used this product one of the spokes ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I used this product one of the spokes inside broke and the umbrella will not stay shut when retracted. I have umbrella's that were way less expensive this this that are lasting longer.
customer_reviews.author: mellisa

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella is great! Stands up to the wind blasts between skyscrapers ...
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is great! Stands up to the wind blasts between skyscrapers and has enough coverage for two (and their bags). The checkered pattern is unique and the handle has a nice grip.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Broke After About 20 Uses. Great Size Though.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for very rainy days. Was initially happy. Yesterday, out of nowhere, two of the rod attachments came unattached, so it's now useless. The size is great though.
customer_reviews.author: TERESA_89

customer_reviews.title: My only dislike it that it doesn't fold down to a compact ...
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is huge! You don't have to worry about getting wet with this one! My only dislike it that it doesn't fold down to a compact size for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: G. Blanche

customer_reviews.title: A great umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is very well made .It is very nice looking .It fuctions well .The only thing I would change is the slip case ,it is diificult to put back in the slip on storage cover.A zipper storage case would be a great impovement.
customer_reviews.author: Farley Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Big and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Will not blow inside out, even on a blustery day. You may have to hold on tighter to keep it from blowing away, though.
customer_reviews.author: T.R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! A little heavy but very sturdy and large ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! A little heavy but very sturdy and large enough to cover me and kids. Makes me not mind the rain so much :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big, convenient, functional
customer_reviews.text: Good umbrella. Unfortunately, I perceived the color incorrectly in the image. It IS a dark burgundy, like it says, not pink/magenta like it looks. My fault, not the company's, I guess, but more pics might've helped?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while ago and it is still going strong (knock on wood). I live in FL and use this often. It is very sturdy and durable. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Get under it
customer_reviews.text: Bigger is better, two layers is better than one, and resistance to turning inside out is enormously valuable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Altschuler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, so far, good size. Covers me and my power scooter, allowing me to get out when raining.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Bowdish

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Penn State University blue and white colors. Very large umbrella and love the automatic opening. Arrived in two days!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: I think it works just fine and is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: my wife thinks it is too heavy for her, but she is the one who walks the dog in the rain and smaller umbrellas didn't work well. I think it works just fine and is sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Speltigi

customer_reviews.title: Breaks if windy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this umbrella until the first big gust of wind came up, turned it inside out and the umbrella broke :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gelinas

customer_reviews.title: Top quality umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something like my dad's had for the last 15 years and this took the cake. It's every bit as good as his umbrella with some added features that I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Love these umbrellas!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several of these for work and man they are awesome!! When prospects visit on rainy days, these do the trick!! They provide a wide coverage and are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Literally best umbrella I've ever owned. Strudy, wont flip inside out, MASSIVE coverage. I would definitely reccommend
customer_reviews.author: zane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, best umbrella I have ever owned. It seemss very strong and has a nice comfy handle. The only thing it does not have it auto close which would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Christopher Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella is great. I ordered a full green one (that is ...
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is great. I ordered a full green one (that is pictures) but I received a green and white striped one. Still a great umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Looked great .... did not last beyond 2 holes in moderate wind/rain.
customer_reviews.text: It broke on the first time out in moderate wind and rain. Given the value it's not worth it for me to return it for a refund or replacement. DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Grasshoppers 60 inch golf umbrella
customer_reviews.text: You don't need to play golf to enjoy this umbrella in a downpour! Large enough to cover my husband, Grandson, and myself. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda S Detlefs

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella for the price. Kept me dry is a pretty hard storm with heavy winds
customer_reviews.author: Vincent M.

customer_reviews.title: Great one!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a great umbrella! I really should have invested in a decent umbrella before I was 40 and with 2 small children. But better late than never!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Conklin

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella is perfect. I used it 4 times with no problems
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is perfect. I used it 4 times with no problems, and once it bad winds. Good size, Made well, no problems. Price is good. Package was perfect for the umbrella. I will be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product but I ordered Blue and white with golf ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product but I ordered Blue and white with golf grip. Ended up with forest green and U grip. Would have returned but was giving it as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Carson

customer_reviews.title: Broke 2nd time I used it
customer_reviews.text: Second time I used it, since it doesn't rain often in Cali, umbrella broke upon opening it up. The frame is made of plastic, and not very sturdy. My mission for a good wind proof umbrella continues.
customer_reviews.author: Diana R.

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for two
customer_reviews.text: This is a good choice for a non-folding umbrella that belongs in an umbrella stand. Fairly heavy, as umbrellas go, with heavy weight cloth, it has a very easy and solid mechanism. It does perform well in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: D. Steiner

customer_reviews.title: it started leaking (where the fabric meets the central pole) in the third week I got it and it has only gotten worse. Would not
customer_reviews.text: While the umbrella seems to be well made, it started leaking (where the fabric meets the central pole) in the third week I got it and it has only gotten worse. Would not recommend, at all.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Large enough and sturdy enough, one of the best umbrellas I've owned. Though the case it fits into is sort of a one-time use. Good luck putting it back in it's case each time.
customer_reviews.author: flcowboy7

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargin Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella probably isn't as nice as the expensive name brands, but it's still pretty good. The construction of it is all pretty solid with the button being the only exception. The button that opens the umbrella feels a little bit cheap, but I haven't had any problems with it so far. Overall a good umbrella especially if you don't want to pay top dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great unbrella
customer_reviews.text: I have used this when walking the dog, and it is just what I needed. It is good in the wind keeps us both dry. It isn't heavy so if I need to just carry it in case of rain I can.
customer_reviews.author: jakell

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color, was suppose to be Aqua, turned ...
customer_reviews.text: Wrong color, was suppose to be Aqua, turned out to be Kelly Green. Not able to use the product. Loss of Money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Salas

customer_reviews.title: MAYBE I GOT A LEMON
customer_reviews.text: IT WON'T STAY CLOSED UNLESS THE VELCRO STRAPS ARE AROUND THE UMBRELLA. MAYBE I GOT A FLAWED ONE BUT DIDN'T FIND OUT UNTIL IT WAS TOO LATE TO RETURN IT.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley Face

customer_reviews.title: Good-sized umbrella
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the size of this umbrella. I gave four stars because golf umbrellas of similar size are not as expensive in local stores but I prchasedthis one to qualify for the free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: M. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Very Good useful Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Very Good useful Umbrella, Good size and we have needed it since we have been getting tons of rain here in TX and LA
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Replacement please?
customer_reviews.text: I did love this umbrella until it broke on me and I had to leave it in a train station during a rain storm. The springs disconnect from the shaft and it couldn't close anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The latch that holds this umbrella closed broke within one month of getting it. Try another product.
customer_reviews.author: mcfryer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Dry
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a super big umbrella so when I walked from my office to my car not only did I stay dry but so did my bags. This works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Equipment

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the large size and it covered both my dog and I.
customer_reviews.author: Tippy D

customer_reviews.title: We are so happy for this product
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy for this product. It was exactly what I expected from the product description and it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: smartl902

customer_reviews.title: It is a fine umbrella. It was bought for a specific purpose ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a fine umbrella. It was bought for a specific purpose and fulfilled the purpose of a large red umbrella
customer_reviews.author: raghu grandhige

product_meta.title: RainStoppers 60-Inch Windbuster Golf Umbrella
product_meta.description: This RainStoppers 60" Auto Open, Windbuster, golf umbrella is constructed with fiberglass shaft and ribs for maximum stability. Windbuster technology allows wind to pass through the umbrella canopy in high wind situations. Auto open feature makes it easy to open this umbrella with one hand. At 60" this umbrella is large enough to cover at least two adults. Canopy is 190T Nylon fabric. Complete with a golf grip handle. Matching sleeve included. Length when closed is 39".
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
